source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH testCTE AS (
    SELECT
        DISTINCT 
              F.ClaimNo,
        F.ExposureNo,
        F.SrcReinsur_ID as Sapiens_Reinsurer_ID,
        F.SrcBrokerID as Sapiens_Broker_ID,
        F.SrcPoolID as Sapiens_Pool_ID,
        F.SecontRefNo,
        F.RetentionInd,
        convert(
            date,
            DATEADD(
                dd,
                -1,
                DATEADD(qq, DATEDIFF(qq, 0, F.Valuation_Dt), 0)
            )
        ) as Entrydate,
        F.Valuation_Dt,
        F.CashFlowBatchID,
        C.Credit_Provision_Percent,
        R.Reco_Desc as ReinsurerName,
        E.Pool_Name,
        d.Broker_Desc,
        b.Related_Claim_No,
        F.Case_Loss as projectedCededTotalPaidExInLimits,
        --Map to projectedCededTotalPaidExInLimits
        F.Case_Adjusting_Expense as projectedCededTotalPaidDefExpense,
        --Map to projectedCededTotalPaidDefExpense
        F.Case_Coverage_DJ_Expense as projectedCededPaidCoverageDjExpense
        --Map to projectedCededPaidCoverageDjExpense

    FROM
        [RS_ODS].[trn].[Ceded_Financial_Transaction] F
        left JOIN RS_ODS.rein.Reinsurer R ON F.SrcReinsur_ID = R.System_Reco_Cd
        AND R.Sys_RowEndDt = '9999-12-31'
        left join [rein].[Pool] as e on F.[PoolID] = e.[Pool_ID] and e.Sys_RowEndDt = '9999-12-31'
        left join [rein].[Broker] as d on F.[BrokerID] = d.[BrokerID] and d.Sys_RowEndDt = '9999-12-31'
        left join [ref].[Rein_Related_Claims] as b on F.[ClaimNo] = b.sapiens_Claim_no
        and F.[ExposureNo] = b.exposure_no
        LEFT JOIN RS_ODS.rein.Reinsurer_Credit_Provision C ON C.Reinsurer_ID = R.Reinsurer_ID
        AND C.Status_Cd = 'VAL'
        AND C.Sys_RowEndDt = '9999-12-31'
    WHERE
        Valuation_Dt =(
            SELECT
                MAX(Valuation_Dt)
            FROM
                [RS_ODS].[trn].[Ceded_Financial_Transaction]
       )

    GROUP BY
        F.ClaimNo,
        F.ExposureNo,
        F.SrcReinsur_ID,
        F.SrcBrokerID,
        F.SrcPoolID,
        F.SecontRefNo,
        F.RetentionInd,
        convert(
            date,
            DATEADD(
                dd,
                -1,
                DATEADD(qq, DATEDIFF(qq, 0, F.Valuation_Dt), 0)
            )
        ),
        F.Valuation_Dt,
        F.CashFlowBatchID,
        C.Credit_Provision_Percent,
        R.Reco_Desc,
        E.Pool_Name,
        d.Broker_Desc,
        b.Related_Claim_No,
        F.Case_Loss,
        --Map to projectedCededTotalPaidExInLimits
        F.Case_Adjusting_Expense,
        --Map to projectedCededTotalPaidDefExpense
        F.Case_Coverage_DJ_Expense --Map to projectedCededPaidCoverageDjExpense)

)
SELECT
    ClaimNo,
    ExposureNo,
    Sapiens_Reinsurer_ID,
    Sapiens_Broker_ID,
    Sapiens_Pool_ID,
    SecontRefNo,
    RetentionInd,
    Entrydate,
    Valuation_Dt,
    CashFlowBatchID,
    Credit_Provision_Percent,
    ReinsurerName,
    Pool_Name,
    Broker_Desc,
    Related_Claim_No,
    sum(projectedCededTotalPaidExInLimits) as projectedCededTotalPaidExInLimits,
    --Map to projectedCededTotalPaidExInLimits
    sum(projectedCededTotalPaidDefExpense) as projectedCededTotalPaidDefExpense,
    --Map to projectedCededTotalPaidDefExpense
    Sum(projectedCededPaidCoverageDjExpense) as projectedCededPaidCoverageDjExpense,
 --Map to projectedCededPaidCoverageDjExpense
  CONVERT(VARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', 
  CONCAT(ClaimNo, ' ', ExposureNo, ' ', CAST(Sapiens_Reinsurer_ID AS VARCHAR), ' ', CAST(Sapiens_Broker_ID AS VARCHAR), ' ', CAST(Sapiens_Pool_ID AS VARCHAR), ' ', 
  SecontRefNo, ' ', RetentionInd, ' ', CAST(entryDate AS VARCHAR), ' ', Credit_Provision_Percent, ' ', ReinsurerName, ' ', Pool_Name, ' ', Broker_Desc, ' ', Related_Claim_No, ' ',
  CAST(sum(projectedCededTotalPaidExInLimits) AS VARCHAR), ' ', CAST(sum(projectedCededTotalPaidDefExpense) AS VARCHAR), ' ', CAST(Sum(projectedCededPaidCoverageDjExpense) AS VARCHAR))
  ),2) as CededHashKey
FROM
    testCTE
--where ClaimNo = 'CC000007943'
group by
    ClaimNo,
    ExposureNo,
    Sapiens_Reinsurer_ID,
    Sapiens_Broker_ID,
    Sapiens_Pool_ID,
    SecontRefNo,
    RetentionInd,
    Entrydate,
    Valuation_Dt,
    CashFlowBatchID,
    Credit_Provision_Percent,
    ReinsurerName,
    Pool_Name,
    Broker_Desc,
    Related_Claim_No
